body: It seems that this isn't a ntr to me but it was a great doujin i like this shit

@SLAP The focus of the story is the MC being seduced by Wife into being sexfriends. The husband's side of the story where the NTR exists (his wife got a sexfriend behind his back) is not relevant. Still, there is an element of NTR so it may deserve an NTR tag, but you can't expect nhentai to tag very diligently all the time. There are many similar stories to this but NTR haters won't mind it cuz it has no NTR tag. tbh, that's double standards, but meh who cares. Anyway, it would be vanilla if let's say the husband was not a good hubby to wife and she deserves a better man. But since we don't get the hubby's pov, this aint quite vanilla imo.
@DrinksandDame, so it's not NTR and vanilla?

There's no ntr "technically" from MC's side of story. FMC's a married woman who was in heat for another man. MC was about to force himself on her but she wants it too anyway so yay consent. They banged rarely (the 2nd scene was 10 days after) but a lot of times in those rare days. Wife's striking message is "If we do it everyday, we'll get fed up with it. So let's just do it sometimes." Anyway, one day the restaurant that Wife owns suddenly closes. Apparenty, her husband was originally against the restaurant thing but she pushed through it on her own. What the neighbor said was that hubby asked her to come back, and so she did. In the end, she showed up to MC again. fin. It could be that she has some affection for MC now, but I think it's more likely that they're just sex friends. She initiates their sex everytime by inviting him for a meal, and thats also what she said in the last scene. Anyway, the story's just about a cheating woman, simply put. No ntr, but not quite vanilla either.
i think ntr is at part 2 theres i mean the scene at the end

Kinda confused here why it's tag as NTR? I'm not seeing any douchebag banging the FMC at all. Please enlighten me.
@panicox11 it's a cliché hentai plot where heroine leaves then comes back at the end to end the dj in a happy note. p. 79 she rang the doorbell to his place and surprises him. :) Good ending
